problems.problem: Which tag is used to create a hyperlink?
Identify the mandatory root element of an HTML page.
Correct the tag:
What does HTML stand for?
Which heading tag represents the highest importance?
Create a line break without a paragraph.
Add an alt attribute to this tag:
Which tag creates a bold text? (Traditional way)
Which tag is semantically preferred for important bold text?
Identify the element that contains meta information about the document.
Implementation: Create an unordered list with 3 items.
Debug: Why doesn't <a link='google.com'> work?
Real-world: Which tag is used for an navigation section?
Implementation: Create a button that triggers a JS alert.
Scenario: You need to embed a YouTube video. Which tag do you use?
Implementation: Create a password input field.
Conceptual: What is the difference between <div> and <span>?
problems.solution: div is block-level, span is inline-level.

problems.problem: Implementation: Associate a label with an input field using the 'for' attribute.

Optimization: Which is better for SEO -
Section 1
or

Section 1

?
problems.solution: h2 is better for SEO as it provides structure.

problems.problem: Implementation: Create a table with 2 rows and 2 columns.
Scenario: Implementing an accessible form for screen readers.
problems.solution: Use aria-label, aria-describedby, and proper label associations.

problems.problem: Implementation: Create a <picture> element that shows different images based on screen width.
Conceptual: Explain the Document Object Model (DOM) tree in the context of HTML parsing.
problems.solution: The browser parses HTML into an object-oriented representation of the tags.

problems.problem: Debugging: Fix a FOUT (Flash of Unstyled Text) using HTML <link> attributes.
Optimization: Use lazy loading for images without JS.
